properties.name: Monteaux's Public House
properties.description: Posted by Willametteweek 16165 SW Regatta Ln Beaverton, OR 97006In keeping with the spirit of community togetherness, on Election Night 2008 Monteaux’s will become a tri-partisan haven for politics-weary Democrats, Republicans and Independents alike with their “It’s Finally Over!” celebration. Customers will be kept up to date with big-screen election results while plying themselves with Monteaux’s Election Night specials. Where: Monteaux\'s Public House Price: FREE When: 6:00pm Tue 11.04.08

properties.name: 23Hoyt
properties.description: Posted by Willametteweek 529 NW 23rd Ave, Portland, OR Election coverage on TV and all-night happy hour.

properties.name: Amanda Fritz @ Ecotrust
properties.description: Posted by Willametteweek    721 NW 9th, Portland OR2nd floor conference room (elevator and parking available). Starts 7 p.m., ends 9 p.m., speech at 7:30 p.m. Then hopefully a big cheer at 8:05 when the first results are posted. Pizza, cake and soft drinks provided. Children welcome. Two big screens to watch local and national results. Free wireless Internet if you want to bring your own laptop.

properties.name: American Cowgirls
properties.description: Posted by Willametteweek  500 NE Martin Luther King Blvd, Portland, OR

properties.name: Anna Bannana’s Cafe & Bar
properties.description: Posted by Willametteweek   8716 N Lombard St, Portland, OR 97302Watch the coverage of all of the National and Local Elections on TV with our friends and neighbors in Saint Johns and North Portland. All Ages, families and children are welcome. Lots of political stuff!

properties.name: Bagdad Theatre
properties.description: Posted by Willametteweek 3702 SE Hawthorne Blvd, PORTLAND, OR, 97214-5146McMenamins and CBS/KOIN Local 6 present…ELECTION NIGHT 2008 Doors at 5 p.m | Free | 21 & over

properties.name: Barackspace Cafe
properties.description: Posted by Willametteweek    115 NW 5th Portland, OR For one-night only, Backspace Cafe becomes BarackSpace, your kid-friendly election night headquarters. The Free event is hosted by Activistas, Poligots, Momocrats and will feature Election Map Coloring, Pin the Tail on the on the Dem Donkey and many other games for parents and children. Plus, it\'s free.

properties.name: Basta's Italian Restaurant
properties.description: Posted by Willametteweek 410 NW 21st Ave, Portland, ORElection coverage streaming on the big screen. Free Pizza Bianca and Happy Hour all night long.

properties.name: Bipartisan Cafe
properties.description: Posted by Willametteweek   7901 SE Stark Street, PortlandElection coverage starts at 5. Enjoy with Stumptown Coffee, Homemade pies, soup, sandwiches and free Wi-Fi.

properties.name: Charles Lewis Campaign Headquarters
properties.description: Posted by Willametteweek 8 NE Killingsworth St, Portland, OROur election night party will be held at our campaign headquarters (8 NE Killingsworth St). Join us at 7:30pm as we watch returns from across the country, listen to a live performance from Earl and the Reggae All-Stars and celebrate Charles\' campaign.

properties.description: Posted by Willametteweek 1001 SE Water Avenue, Portland, ORAll-night happy hour and election coverage.

properties.description: Posted by Willametteweek 1412 Se Morrison St, Portland, OR

properties.name: Curous Comedy Theater
properties.description: Posted by Willametteweek  5225 NE Martin Luther King BLVD, Portland, OR We are having an election viewing party at Curious Comedy Theater from 5pm-11pm on Tuesday night. Admission is free. We will be screening the coverage live and have some food and drinks and fun. Please come by and bring some friends.

properties.name: Doug Fir Lounge
properties.description: Posted by Willametteweek    830 E. Burnside Portland, OR 97214Food, drinks, games and scantily-clad women plus analysis from Steve Novick and music from DJs Gregarious and Flightrisk. Mayor Sam Adams is also expected to make a cameo. Sponsored by the Portland Mercury.

properties.name: Grand Central Bowl
properties.description: Posted by Willametteweek    808 SE Morrison St., Portland, ORIt\'s the Willamette Week Election Night Party with the Bus Project! Cocktails, food, raffles, live music and cheap bowling, plus the best in election coverage.

properties.name: Greek Cusina
properties.description: Posted by Willametteweek 404 Sw Washington St, Portland, ORTom Dwyer Automotive is hosting a party at the Greek Cusina especially for KPOJ listeners.

properties.name: Kell's Irish Restaurant & Pub
properties.description: Posted by Willametteweek 112 SW Second Avenue, Portland ORHey, just because it\'s an Irish pub doesn\'t mean they can\'t have an American Election Night.

properties.name: Mission Theater
properties.description: Posted by Willametteweek 1624 NW Glisan St 97209Watch live election results and count the votes with a cold beer and a juicy burger. 5 pm. Doors, Free, 21 and over.

properties.name: Mock Crest Tavern
properties.description: Posted by Willametteweek 3435 N. Lombard, Portland, ORSean Gettings is hosting a party in North PDX at the Mock Crest Tavern on Lombard starting around 8pm. Hopes to see everyone there.

properties.name: Nick Kahl's Campaign Headquarters
properties.description: Posted by Willametteweek 107 East Historic Columbia River Hwy, troutdale, orNick Kahl\'s campaign will start the evening at their campaign headquarters in Troutdale: 107 East Historic Columbia River Hwy, Stes 203 & 204 and then join the throng at the Convention Center later.

properties.name: Olea
properties.description: Posted by Willametteweek 1338 Nw Hoyt St, Portland, ORPreparing for the impending depression? Sharpen your soup kitchen skillz at Olea, where they\'re offering a free bowl of soup to folks who go there to watch the election coverage.

properties.name: Oregon Association of Minority Entrepreneurs
properties.description: Posted by Willametteweek 4134 N. Vancouver Ave, Portland, OR 97217Home of the African Americans for Obama election-night party.

properties.name: Oregon Convention Center
properties.description: Posted by Willametteweek    777 NE ML King Blvd., Portland, ORElection Night Events in Portland Because of the intense interest in Election Night, there will be a ticketed volunteer appreciation event at the Convention Center. There will, however, be many smaller parties and hospitality rooms in the building, hosted by campaigns and elected officials. Defend Oregon Coalition Please join us on Election Night to watch the ballot returns and enjoy some refreshments. We\'ll be in room C123 at the Oregon Convention Center, beginning at 7pm. We\'d love to see you there! Oregon House Democrats Hospitality suite in room A 106 of the Convention Center. Stop by, watch the election returns, and meet current and new members of House Democratic caucus. Doors open at 7:30. Congressman David Wu 7:00 PM-11:00 PM The Oregon Convention Center, Suite B111 on the first floor Other Hospitality Suites: Blumenauer/Obama ILWU/AFL-CIO Merkley/ForwardOregon Wyden Statewide Electeds (Avakian, Brown, Kroger, Westlund) OBA OLCV/ORNC-Action Bernard/Lehan Check signs for locations. These rooms open at varying times and entrance to these rooms is set by each campaign. Team Matthews Election Night Celebration! Nov 4 2008 - 7:00pm Please join Greg Matthews and "Team Matthews" to celebrate the hard work, dedication and enthusiasm of a hard fought election season! Drinks, hors d\'oeuvres and TV coverage provided. To reserve your place, contact Andy Darkins at 503.665.5861. Boccelli\'s Ristorante (map)?246 N Main Ave?Gresham, OR

properties.name: Pizza Schmizza - Hillsboro Airport
properties.description: Posted by Willametteweek 891 NE 25th Ave, Hillsboro, OR 97124Coverage will be on TV all day but the official "event" will begin at 5PM. We have three TV\'s as will be monitoring three different channels. All large, XL and Classic one topping pizzas will be off of the regular price. Identify yourself as a Democrat and receive pint beers (21 & Over) from Off the Rail Brewery in Forest Grove.

properties.name: Redwing Coffee and Bakery
properties.description: Posted by Willametteweek  1700 SE 6th Ave Portland ORPortland Metro Pacific Green Party is hosting an election night party at a Redwing Coffee and Bakery, a worker owned restaurant in inner southeast Portland at the corner of SE 6th and Market. Come down and meet the candidates and watch election results on Redwing’s big screen TV.

properties.name: Saucebox
properties.description: Posted by Willametteweek 214 Sw Broadway, Portland, OREnjoy the all-night happy hour as you watch the results come in.

properties.name: The Cleaners at Ace Hotel
properties.description: Posted by Willametteweek 1022 SW Stark St. PortlandFor a classic American experience including popcorn, a big balloon drop, champagne and ten flat-screen TVS get to The Cleaners at the Ace Hotel for their Election Night Party 2008. This 21+ event charges 5, but all the proceeds are matched by the Ace Hotel and will go to the organization of your vote. Plus, free snacks!
